title: Maybe someday we could be a power couple?
text:
Hey CL, hope you're having a great week so far! I'm on here looking for something that could turn into a real relationship but open for new friends if we have something in common, just not the chemistry. I've met some cool people on here before, so giving it another try.

I'm active and fun, intelligent and ambitious, and thoughtful and kind. I'm looking for someone similar. I'm not looking to take care of someone or be taken care of...which seems to be the two positions most people on here want to be in. I just want to find an equal that I can get to know and eventually build a LTR with.

I have a wide variety of interests and hope to find someone who enjoys the same: movies, shows, dining out or cooking together at home, reading, gaming, road trips, hiking, museums, zoos, aquaria, shopping, gardening, home improvement/renovation, and at the end of it all, cuddling up together and watching a little TV off the DVR.

I work/live in DC but am a citizen of the entire metro area. I have favorite spots from Sterling to Annapolis; Baltimore to Fredericksburg. I have a car and while I hate driving in a commuting sense, I love heading out on the weekends to anything in the area that might be fun and interesting. I'm definitely looking for someone open to areas outside some favorite neighborhoods or even the beltway.

A couple final things: I'm 35, white, 6'2", with some extra weight (which hopefully you can love or look past). Beyond everything above, I'm looking for guys in their 20s/30s, guys who are non-smokers and drug free, and guys who can string some words together and have meaningful conversations (and will want to actually meet up for a date someday).

I'd prefer to actually see who I'm talking to at some point, so pics in the first or second email are definitely appreciated...I'll do the same.

Cheers :-)

title: Who Wants a Caring Country Boy?
text:
Don't get me wrong, I get just as horny as the next guy on here. But that is not enough to keep me happy. I like to make real connections, real friends, real romance, really get to know people. That's a little bit harder to find.

I'm new to the area, so I don't really have that many friends around here. I just moved here in mid January. I'm looking to get to know guys my age or younger who are looking for someone in their life they can depend on being there. I'm a very caring person by nature. I was born in the country, and a little small town, so I'm not quite like the rest of the city slickers around here. ;-)

I enjoy spending my time with my friends, going out and having a drink or making one here at home, cuddling up to a movie, having a long conversation about you or about anything intellectual or scientific, we're traveling somewhere new with a road trip buddy. 

Eventually I would like to find a partner, not just a boyfriend. I want him to be handsome and compassionate. Everything else is negotiable. :-) 

I've gone through a lot of personal loss in the last year of my life, and I need people close by who I can call up and meet up with. It would help me a lot, but I don't want it to just be a one-way street. I like helping other people through their problems and being a supportive friend.

I don't really go out to the clubs very much, and even if I do, I'm too shy to approach people. So this is kind of my way to meet new people. I know some of the responses will be only sexual, because they always are. But that's not really the purpose of this ad. I'm looking for someone with a good heart who wants a friend. Even if there's nothing more than that, it will be wonderful. But who knows? I might meet someone on here who is even more than that. And I'm OK with that too. :-)

If this interests you at all, write me back. I don't mind meeting in public somewhere first or having you over to my place for a drink or dinner.

As far as friendship, I'm not super picky, but I generally get along well with guys my age or younger. Sometimes much younger. So don't be afraid to write me just because you are a freshman in college or something like that. LOL I'm a pretty cool guy and can get along with everyone mostly.
